scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js && npm run copy-assets
scripts.build:production: npm run build && npm run zip
scripts.copy-assets: xcopy /E /I /Y inc dist\inc && copy /Y *.php dist\ && copy /Y README.md dist\
scripts.zip: cd dist && (if exist sweet-portofolio rmdir /s /q sweet-portofolio) && mkdir sweet-portofolio && xcopy /E /I /Y assets sweet-portofolio\assets >nul && xcopy /E /I /Y inc sweet-portofolio\inc >nul && copy *.php sweet-portofolio\ >nul && copy README.md sweet-portofolio\ >nul && powershell -NoProfile -Command "Compress-Archive -Force -Path '.\sweet-portofolio' -DestinationPath '.\sweet-portofolio.zip'"
